perturbation.original_text: 4.7 tyre inspections every month, puncture repairs and replacement of tyres with equal to or less than 2mm of tread remaining and in the  event of the Company failing to change a tyre with equal to or less than 2mm of tread remaining that is identified on the monthly  inspection or which is not available for inspection and the Customer is not informed as such, issue a credit note to the Customer  equal to two weeks Maintenance Charge for the Vehicle concerned;
perturbation.changed_text: 4.7 tyre inspections every month, puncture repairs and replacement of tyres with equal to or less than 2mm of tread remaining and in the  event of the Service Provider failing to change a tyre with equal to or less than 2mm of tread remaining that is identified on the monthly  inspection or which is not available for inspection and the client is not informed as such, the client can request an adjustment equal to one weeks the Vehicle Maintenance Charge.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Company' is changed to 'Service Provider' and 'Customer' is changed to 'Client' without any definition. 'Issue a credit note' is changed to 'request an adjustment'. It is now unclear who 'client' is referring to ('DCL' or 'the Hirer').

perturbation.original_text: 2. perturbation.changed_text: 2. SEV's Obligations. In consideration of the payment by DCL from time to time of the Maintenance Charges in accordance with the provisions of Clause 3 below SEV shall during the term of this Agreement. 2.1 provide the Repair Services in respect of the vehicles upon the terms and conditions of this Agreement and with all due skill, care and diligence using goods of satisfactory qualify and fit for the purpose;

perturbation.original_text: 9. perturbation.changed_text: 9. DCL's Obligations. During the term of this Agreement, DCL shall: 9.3 use its reasonable endeavours to ensure that daily Truck inspections, in accordance with company guidelines are completed (and recorded daily in writing) and that tyre pressures, engine oil, coolant and windscreen washer fluid are maintained at the correct levels and topped up if necessary;
